messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Osamu Tezuka Shinsengumi series?
messages.msgSnippet: Don t the dates at the bottom of the page of the second link indicate it s from 1971?  That IS old --- I wasn t even in high school yet (and that s saying
messages.messageBody:
Don't the dates at the bottom of the page of the second link indicate it's from 1971? That IS old --- I wasn't even in high school yet (and that's saying something... LOL).

phil (who promises to go read that Mito article Sec sent and leave you guys alone now)

P.S. MissB -- I think that's a wonderful idea for a game. LOL

Never heard of it before....looks OLD...

--M.
